name: Energy Shift
description: Energy Shift is a web based, blockchain powered platform that enables citizens to jointly invest in and co-own solar parks, thus democratising the energy sector and enabling citizens to actively participate in the energy transition to renewable energy.
one_liner: Energy Shift is a web based, blockchain powered platform that enables citizens to jointly invest in and co-own solar parks, thus democratising the energy sector and enabling citizens to actively participate in the energy transition to renewable energy.
